title: What the 'Friends' cast just posted to celebrate 25 years
text:
All for one and one for all, the "Friends" cast sure sticks together!

Courteney Cox, David Schwimmer, Lisa Kudrow and Matt LeBlanc all just posted similar tributes celebrating 25 years of the show.

The real anniversary is Sunday, but since the show was on Thursdays, they thought it appropriate to post today.

"Celebrating a Thursday night 25 years ago. Thank you to all of our loyal fans across the world. You’ve certainly been there for us!" Cox wrote on Instagram.

She added, "I love these guys!"

Cox made a joke about good friend Jennifer Aniston not being on Instagram with the hashtag "#seriouslyjen?" Kudrow later hashtagged, "#COMEONALREADYJEN."

The rest of the comments are similar with Schwimmer adding, "THANK YOU to all the fans out there!! We couldn't have done it without you."

Kudrow had her own take with, "We might be in different places but we are connected."

And finally LeBlanc added, "Seems like yesterday."

Yes it does Matt, it really does.
